name: Berry Pebbles
description:
Berry Pebbles is a strawberry and blueberry cereal covered in a divine sweet milk. It has a perfect balance between the actual fruits, cereal and milk. It delivers a nice crunchy fruity cereal vape with the perfect amount of milk. Seriously addictive and delicious.

This is easily one of the best recipe i have ever created.

Some people prefer a steep of 2 weeks, i really enjoy this recipe after 7 days. If you don't like it after 1 week let it steep for another week and try again.

The base was inspired by Pebbles from NotCharlesManson.

https://www.reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/60p8xj/berry_pebbles_a_blueberry_strawberry_cereal_with/
author: Fuzzy055

reviews.text: I've steeped this for over 2 weeks now. I've tried it earlier as well, and to me it doesn't feel like the taste changed that drastically in the mean time. For now, I just can't seem to taste the defined profile in the description. It doesn't taste awful or anything, it just doesn't seem to taste like anything specific to me, like it's a mish-mash of the flavors above and they just don't really come together to make a recognizable taste.
At first I thought this was eh and left it in my drawer.  2 weeks later I tried it again and it was awesome!  I would definitely recommend a 2 week steep for this before it really blooms.
